publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2197 Ross Finnie: The Draft Waste (Scotland) Regulations 2005—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Waste (Scotland) Regulations 2005 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*

S2M-2197 Ross Finnie: The Draft Waste (Scotland) Regulations 2005—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Waste (Scotland) Regulations 2005 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald
